name: Mcservers-interduce-guide
body:
### MCServers Guide
MCServers is simple interface to host your minecraft server.

### Introduce
I think Multi***** or other panel is too expensive or hard to use. Then I think simple minecraft hosting panel is required on now. Then I made this!

### Pricing
This panel is semi-free(Free if you host servers for free).
You are not effected to free conditions? No worry.
It is really cheap! You just need to pay 10% of your hosting's earned money.
This is still expensive? Mail [here](castarnet@gmail.com) and get your awesome offer!

### How to use this?
I'm really worried about source code's leak, just mail [here](castarnet@gmail.com) and introduce you.

### This is not 100% free
Just core program is free. You need to buy or make your web or other panel.
I hope some contributor make good panel. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with MCServers? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
